snippet.title: C64 Game - London Blitz
snippet.description: In this you have to travel around an odd maze while somehow trying to defuse bombs. I'm perplexed. Released in 1984 by Avalon Hill Microcomputer Games, Inc. and programmed by Duncan Scott.
